entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 11.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near noon then becoming west 30 gusting to 50. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Overcast. Low minus 4.
